results.title: Amelia Rose Towers
results.creator_credit: Jackie Farkas, Nicole Sorby, AFTRS and Ashley Scarlett
results.brief_description: If, as a child, you were picked last for a team and sought as your refuge a wish or a dream. If you ever felt lonely, peculiar or blue, then Amelia Rose Towers is a bit like you! True! Amelia Rose Towers, ‘whose initials spell ART’, faces off against an adversary whose initials spell MAN, after passing through surrealist chambers and screens offering images of a personal identity that can never be reconciled. A story of juggling variables of reality of self and other; of space, time and perceptions; of the art of science and the science of art but it is also a story of hope, love and courage.

results.title: Metamorphs: 1st year Swinburne Multimedia Design Project
results.brief_description:
A selection of animated morphs created by nine students in their first year Multimedia course, Faculty of Design, Swinburne University of Technology.
The students are: Alicia Braumberger, Andrew Coles, Matthew Robinson, Michael Yates, Oliver Pauliczek, Reif Campling, Richard Osellame, Steven Donnet and Yudy Chainy.
Includes a single split-screen edited trailer and a full version of each of the nine morphs created by the students.

results.title: The Rentman
results.creator_credit: Ross Hutchens, AFTRS and Peter Flynn
results.brief_description: A rent collector for the Housing Commission (low cost public housing) calls on one of his tenants, an elderly Aboriginal woman, for their regular cup of tea together. In the past he has protected her against the bureaucracy of the state housing system, but this visit is different.

results.title: Odd jobs
results.creator_credit: Daniel Nettheim, Jonathon Green, AFTRS and Andrew Ryan
results.brief_description: Two Boy Scouts, intent on earning money by doing odd jobs, stumble upon a spooky old house and its macabre owner. He looks forward to scaring them with his “house of horrors” - but young boys today aren’t so easily frightened.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Daniel Nettheim, Jonathon Green, AFTRS and Andrew Ryan

results.creator_credit: Laurie Kirkwood, AFTRS and David Poltorak

results.title: country school diary_13
results.brief_description: An anonymous digital dairy created by a young person as part of a day long workshop run by ACMI. Each diary is scripted and a voiceover recorded by the individual young person. Some diaries use photographs brought in by the participant, but the primary visual content is often black and white, ‘stock’ footage of a poetic nature. At no point should the creator or school be positively identified when screening this work.
